events.name: “A Transformative Leap in Brain Imaging”: Innovative MRI System May Produce First Full Brain Connection Map
events.description: A new brain imaging system, Connectome 2.0, is far outperforming traditional MRIs in imaging microscopic brain structure disruptions.

generated_content.meta_description: Explore historical mysteries in Heinrich-Hoffmann-Straße, Niederrad. Explore the birthplace of modern brain imaging, where scientists have made groundbreaking discoveries in MRI technology.
